channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Greed (Neutral)
channel.description:
Day Ability 1: Treason rights (passive):you gain 1 extra vote when going against the King
Night Ability 1: Target Player: the targeted player goes on your side in voting
Lore: A lunatic who's mad with power
Comments: Win condition:Be voted to be next king ;)
Heyo everyone this is just a thought and not final i like this idea and don't know how to make it what i could become so i need ideas Until next time <3
